main.se450.model

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.se450.model.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, ShapeDroid

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements IShape
    class for shapes. It is the parent class for all shapes.
    Author:
    Yiming Wang
